name: Down the Mines and Ghosts
description:
Watch your steps! The miner's ghosts will repeat them and turn your game into a true bullet hell!

Are you ready for an adventure?

Imagine that you're going deep down to a mine through an elevator...

But on every floor there is a sort of zombie miners and the only way to keep going down is to kill them...

Well then I need to advise you:

Spelunkers never have great stories to tell...

Specially when it comes to miner's ghosts.

Why?

They're watching your steps.

And they're smart!

They know that the only way to defeat you...

is using your own skills against you!

And now that you know that they're watching you, keep that in mind about the ghosts:

I bet that you can't beat the 10th floor... 

Can you? Enjoy!
  • Use W, A, S, D to move the character (or the arrow, if you feel like it)
  • Use the mouse movements to aim
  • Left mouse button shoot

If you do make a gameplay video, feel free to share it bellow, I'd love to watch!
